definition: family scandal/skeleton in the closet

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
shameful/ugly/disgraceful
lit. family shames must not be spread abroad (idiom)/fig. don't wash your dirty linen in public
pinyin: jia1 chou3 bu4 ke3 wai4 yang2

definition: lit. family shames must not be spread abroad (idiom); fig. don't wash your dirty linen in public
pinyin: jia1 chou3 bu4 ke3 wai4 chuan2

definition: Don't spread abroad the shame of the family, don't believe rumors lightly. (idiom)/Don't wash your dirty linen in public, don't listen to others' gossip.
pinyin: jia1 chou3 bu4 ke3 wai4 chuan2 , liu2 yan2 qie4 mo4 qing1 xin4
containing_words.word: 家醜不可外傳，流言切莫輕信

sentences.english: Domestic violence is a family matter, do not wash dirty linen in public.
sentences.chinese: 家庭暴力是家務事，家醜不可外揚。

sentences.english: 4The Smiths regarded their daughter ' s addiction to drugs as a family skeleton.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯夫婦把女兒吸毒成癮視爲家醜。

sentences.english: I wonder how many other skeleton they have get in their cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 我納悶他們到底還有些什麼家醜。

sentences.english: The smiths regarded their daughter's addiction to drugs as a family skeleton .
sentences.chinese: 史密斯夫婦把女兒吸毒成癮視爲家醜。

sentences.english: Many families have a skeleton in the closet.
sentences.chinese: 許多家庭都有不可外揚的家醜。

sentences.english: My father always says, "Domestic shame should not be published.
sentences.chinese: 我爸爸常說:“家醜不可外揚。”

sentences.english: The problem is what might be called "fouling one’s nest."
sentences.chinese: 有一個問題是被稱作“家醜外揚”。

sentences.english: Both her parents were alcoholics; that was the skeleton in her closet.
sentences.chinese: 她父母都酗酒，這是她不願讓人知道的家醜。

definition: to whisper to one another's ear
daring/presumptuous/daredevil
lit. to assess the head and discuss the feet (idiom); minute criticism of a woman's appearance/fig. to find fault in minor details/nitpicking/overcritical
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
to obstruct/to impede
conciliation/mediation/to mollify/to propitiate/to reconcile
not recognizing one's family (idiom); self-centered and not making any allowances for the needs of one's relatives
willingly and gladly (idiom)
to start rumours and create trouble
hunger strike
protective coloration/camouflage
it's nothing personal (idiom)
to behave unscrupulously
lit. to kill the chicken to get the eggs (idiom)/fig. to kill the goose that lays the golden eggs
men and women should not touch hands when they give or receive things (citation, from Mencius)
pinyin: nan2 nu:3 shou4 shou4 bu4 qin1

definition: obscene language
